alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 5:04PM CDT until April 13 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 503 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Crossett, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Old Milo around 515 PM CDT. Hamburg around 520 PM CDT. Snyder around 535 PM CDT. Portland and Montrose around 540 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Blanchton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
